item.title: 001. Dublin
item.description:
Dublin, Ireland #

  • City: éƒ½æŸæ— (dou1 paak3 lam4)

Dublin is the capital city of Ireland, located on the country’s east coast where the River Liffey flows into the sea. ğŸŒŠ It’s the largest city in Ireland and has been the country’s most important city for hundreds of years! ğŸ™ï¸

Where Is Dublin? ğŸ“ #

Dublin sits near the middle of Ireland’s eastern coastline. It’s like the heart of Ireland, with many important roads and railways connecting it to other parts of the country. ğŸš‚ The beautiful River Liffey runs right through the middle of the city before emptying into the Irish Sea. ğŸŒŠ

Prague is the capital and largest city of the Czech Republic, a country located right in the middle of Europe. People often call Prague the “Heart of Europe” â¤ï¸ because it sits almost in the center of the continent! The city is built along the beautiful Vltava river ğŸŒŠ and is famous for its colorful buildings ğŸŒˆ and historic bridges ğŸŒ‰.

item.title: 003. Stockholm
item.description:
Stockholm, Sweden #

  • City: æ–¯å¾·å“¥çˆ¾æ‘© (si1 dak1 go1 ji5 mo1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª ç‘å…¸ (seoi6 din2)

Stockholm is a beautiful city that sits on a collection of islands in Sweden. It’s the capital and largest city of Sweden, located in Northern Europe. Stockholm is a special place with lots of fascinating history, delicious food, and exciting things to see and do! ğŸŒŸ

Where in the World is Stockholm? ğŸŒ #

Stockholm is located in Sweden, which is part of Scandinavia in Northern Europe. The city sits at a special spot where Lake MÃ¤laren meets the Baltic Sea. What makes Stockholm super cool is that it’s built across 14 different islands that are all connected by 57 bridges! ğŸŒ‰ The exact location of Stockholm is 59.334591Â° north and 18.063240Â° east on your globe or map. This unique island layout gives Stockholm the nickname “Beauty on Water.” ğŸ’§

item.title: 007. Florence
item.description:
florence, italy #

  • City: ä½›ç¾…å€«æ–¯ (fat6 lo4 leon4 si1)

Florence is a beautiful historic city located in north-central Italy, in a region called Tuscany. Let’s explore this amazing place that’s full of art, history, and delicious food! ğŸ¨ğŸ

Where is Florence? ğŸ“ #

Florence sits on the banks of the River Arno, surrounded by pretty hills. It’s about 160 feet above sea level and serves as the capital city of Tuscany. If you look at a map of Italy, you’ll find Florence about 65 miles south of Bologna and 190 miles southeast of Milan. The city has coordinates of 43.769562, 11.255814, which are like its special address on Earth! ğŸŒğŸ—ºï¸

Where in the World is Reykjavik? ğŸŒ #

Reykjavik is located in the southwestern part of Iceland, sitting on the shores of FaxaflÃ³i bay ğŸŒŠ. Did you know it’s the northernmost capital city in the world? ğŸ§­â„ï¸ That means it’s farther north than any other country’s main city ğŸ—ºï¸. The city covers about 200 square kilometers of land, which is plenty of space for its residents ğŸ¡.

If you look at a map, you’ll find Copenhagen facing the Ã˜resund Strait, which is the body of water that separates Denmark from its neighbor, Sweden. The Swedish city of MalmÃ¶ is just on the other side, and the two cities are connected by a huge bridge ğŸŒ‰.

Vienna, Austria #

Vienna is the capital city of Austria, a country in Europe known for its beautiful landscapes ğŸŒ„ and rich history ğŸ“œ. It is located in the northeastern part of Austria and lies near the Danube River ğŸŒŠ, one of Europeâ€™s longest rivers. The city is surrounded by lush green hills ğŸŒ¿ and even has vineyards ğŸ‡ within its borders, making it unique among world capitals.

item.title: 014. London
item.description:
London, UK #

  • City: å€«æ•¦ (leon4 deon1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ è‹±åœ‹ (jing1 gwok3)

London is the exciting capital city of England and the United Kingdom. Sitting in the southeast of England on the River Thames ğŸŒŠ (pronounced “Temz”), this bustling city is packed with history, culture, and fascinating sights that would make any young explorer’s eyes ğŸ‘€ widen with wonder!

Where is London? ğŸ“ #

London is located in the southeast part of England on the River Thames. The river flows right through the middle of the city ğŸŒ‡, dividing it into north and south parts. Long ago, people chose this spot to build London because it was the lowest point where they could build a bridge across the Thames. The city has grown over thousands of years from a small Roman settlement to one of the world’s most important cities today!

item.title: 016. Riga
item.description:
Riga, Latvia #

Riga is the capital city of Latvia, a beautiful country in Northern Europe. It’s a place filled with history, amazing buildings, and friendly people. Let’s explore this fascinating city together! ğŸ°

Where in the World is Riga? ğŸŒ #

Riga sits on both banks of the Daugava River, just 9 miles (15 km) from where the river meets the Gulf of Riga and the Baltic Sea. ğŸŒŠ If you look at a map of Europe, you’ll find Latvia nestled between Estonia and Lithuania, with Riga located near Latvia’s coast. The city is so important that about one-third of the entire country’s population lives there! ğŸ‘¥

It is the capital of the region called Catalonia, nestled between the sparkling blue Mediterranean Sea ğŸŒŠ and beautiful mountains â›°ï¸. Before we explore more about this amazing city, let me share that Barcelona is Spain’s second most populous city and is filled with colorful buildings ğŸŒˆ, delicious food ğŸ½ï¸, and friendly people ğŸ˜Š!

item.title: 020. Lisbon
item.description:
Lisbon, Portugal #

  • City: é‡Œæ–¯æœ¬ (lei5 si1 bun2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¹ è‘¡è„ç‰™ (pou4 tou4 ngaa4)

Lisbon is a fascinating city with so much to discover! ğŸ“š It’s the capital and largest city of Portugal, and it’s filled with colorful buildings, delicious food, and lots of history. ğŸŒˆğŸ¤ğŸ° Let’s explore this amazing place together! ğŸŒŸ

Where is Lisbon? ğŸ“ #

Lisbon is located in western Portugal, sitting on the northern shore of the Tagus River where it meets the Atlantic Ocean. ğŸŒ It’s actually the westernmost capital city on the European mainland - that means if you traveled directly west from Lisbon across the ocean, the next land you’d hit would be America! ğŸŒŠ The city is built on seven steep hills, which gives it beautiful views but can make walking around quite a workout! ğŸ—ºï¸â›°ï¸

item.title: 024. Athens
item.description:
Athens, Greece #

  • City: é›…å…¸ (ngaa5 din2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡· å¸Œè‡˜ (hei1 laap6)

Before diving into the details, Athens is an incredible ancient city that has given the world democracy, beautiful architecture like the Parthenon, and continues to be a vibrant capital city with millions of people. It’s a place where you can walk through history while enjoying modern city life! ğŸŒ†

Where is Athens Located? ğŸ“ #

Athens is the capital city of Greece. It’s located in a region called Attica, which is a peninsula in the eastern part of Central Greece. A peninsula is a piece of land surrounded by water on three sides. Athens sits on this Attica peninsula, which sticks out into the Aegean Sea. ğŸŒŠ

Rome is one of the most famous and historic cities in the world! ğŸŒ Located in central Italy, this amazing city has thousands of years of history and fascinating things to discover. Let’s explore the wonderful city of Rome together! ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹

Where in the World is Rome? ğŸŒ #

Rome is located in the central part of Italy, in a region called Lazio. ğŸ—ºï¸ If you look at a map, you’ll find Rome at these coordinates: 41.9028Â° North, 12.4964Â° East. The city sits on the banks of the Tiber River, which flows right through the middle of Rome. ğŸŒŠ

item.title: 026. Warsaw
item.description:
Warsaw, Poland #

  • City: è¯æ²™ (waa4 saa1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡± æ³¢è˜­ (bo1 laan4)

Warsaw is the capital and largest city of Poland. It’s an exciting place with lots of history ğŸ“š, delicious food ğŸ², and amazing people who have changed the world! Let’s discover what makes this city so special.

Where is Warsaw? ğŸ“ #

Warsaw sits right in the middle of Poland on both sides of the Vistula River ğŸŒŠ, which is the largest river in the country. It’s located in east-central Poland, about 350 kilometers (225 miles) from the Baltic Sea ğŸŒŠ. The city is built on what geographers call the North European plains. If you look at a map of Europe ğŸŒ, you’ll find Warsaw almost in the heart of the continent!

item.title: 027. Edinburgh
item.description:
Edinburgh, UK #

  • City: æ„›ä¸å ¡ (oi3 ding1 bou2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ è‹±åœ‹ (jing1 gwok3)

Edinburgh is a fascinating city with ancient castles, extinct volcanoes ğŸŒ‹, and many amazing stories to discover! As Scotland’s capital city, Edinburgh is full of history, culture, and exciting places to explore. Let’s take a journey through this wonderful city and discover what makes it so special.

Where Is Edinburgh? ğŸ“ #

Edinburgh is located in southeast Scotland, in the United Kingdom. The city is built along the southern shore of a large inlet of the North Sea called the Firth of Forth ğŸŒŠ. To the south of the city are the beautiful Pentland Hills â›°ï¸. Edinburgh sits in the Scottish Lowlands, which means it’s in the less mountainous part of Scotland, but the city itself is quite hilly with many ups and downs as you walk around it.

Berlin, Germany #

  • City: æŸæ— (paak3 lam4)

Berlin is one of the most exciting cities in the world, full of history, culture, and fun things to see and do! As Germany’s capital city, Berlin has something special around every corner. Let’s explore this amazing place together and discover what makes it so special. ğŸŒŸ

Where is Berlin Located? ğŸ—ºï¸ #

Berlin sits right in the heart of Europe, in the northeastern part of Germany. The city is built along the banks of the Spree River, which flows right through the center of the city. ğŸŒŠ If you look at a map, you’ll find Berlin about 112 miles (180 km) south of the Baltic Sea and 55 miles (89 km) west of Poland. The city covers an area of about 891 square kilometers, which is pretty big! ğŸ“

item.title: 034. Moscow

Moscow, Russia #

Moscow is one of the world’s most fascinating cities, and there’s so much for young explorers to discover about Russia’s incredible capital. This bustling metropolis sits right in the heart of Russia and has been an important city for nearly 900 years, making it a perfect place to learn about history, culture, and the amazing people who have called it home.

item.title: 037. Paris

Paris, France #

  • City: å·´é» (baa1 lai4)

Have you ever wondered about one of the most famous cities in the world? Let’s take an exciting journey to Paris, the beautiful capital city of France! Paris is like a giant outdoor museum filled with incredible sights, delicious food, and fascinating history that will make you want to visit this magical place. âœ¨

Where is Paris Located? ğŸ“ #

Paris is located in the northern central part of France, a country in Western Europe. The city sits along the beautiful Seine River, which flows right through the middle of the city like a ribbon. ğŸŒŠ Paris is built around two special islands in the river called Ãle Saint-Louis and Ãle de la CitÃ©, which form the oldest part of the city. If you were to travel from London, England, you would need to go about 450 kilometers (280 miles) to reach Paris. The city is perfectly positioned in a region called Ãle-de-France, making it the heart of the country. â¤ï¸

Amsterdam is a fascinating city that looks like something out of a storybook! ğŸ“–âœ¨ Located in the western part of the Netherlands ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡± in Europe, Amsterdam is the capital city and largest city in the country. It sits in the province of North Holland and was built around the Amstel River, which was dammed to control flooding (that’s actually how the city got its name - “Dam in the Amstel”). Let me take you on a journey through this amazing place! ğŸŒŠğŸ™ï¸

Geneva, Switzerland #

Geneva is an amazing city in Switzerland that’s home to many important people and organizations from around the world. This beautiful city sits by a big lake ğŸŒŠ and has fascinating stories about famous fountains, delicious food ğŸ², and brilliant people who changed our world ğŸŒ. Let’s explore what makes Geneva such a special place!

Where is Geneva Located? ğŸ“ #

Geneva is located in the southwestern part of Switzerland, right where a big river called the RhÃ´ne flows out of Lake Geneva. The city sits at an elevation of 1,230 feet and is surrounded by beautiful mountains ğŸ”ï¸. Geneva is very close to the border with France ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·, making it a special place where two countries almost meet. The city covers an area of about 16 square kilometers, which is roughly the size of 2,240 football fields! ğŸŸï¸

Helsinki city skyline featuring the famous white Helsinki Cathedral and the red-brick Uspenski Cathedral by the harbor.

Where is Helsinki? ğŸ“ #

Helsinki is the awesome capital city of Finland, a country in northern Europe. ğŸŒ Imagine looking at a map of Europe and finding the big countries like Germany and France - now look way up north! That’s where Finland is, and Helsinki sits right on the southern edge of the country.

Main Takeaway: Vilnius is the colorful capital of Lithuania, nestled where two rivers meet, with a medieval Old Town, tasty traditional dishes, and home to famous artists, scientists, and writers who helped shape Europe. ğŸ¨ğŸ“šğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ”¬

Where Is Vilnius? ğŸ—ºï¸ #

Vilnius lies in northeastern Europe, in a country called Lithuania. On a map, find the Baltic Sea ğŸŒŠ (the long sea up north), then look southeast to spot Lithuania. The city of Vilnius was first mentioned in writing in 1323, and today it sits at the meeting point of the Neris and Vilnia rivers, surrounded by gentle hills and green parks. ğŸŒ³ğŸï¸

item.title: 049. Zurich
item.description:
Zurich, Switzerland #

  • City: è˜‡é»ä¸– (sou1 lai4 sai3)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ ç‘å£« (seoi6 si6)

Welcome to Zurich, one of Switzerland’s most amazing cities! ğŸŒŸ Imagine a place where tall mountains meet a beautiful lake, where history comes alive in ancient churches, and where some of the world’s greatest minds once lived and worked. ğŸï¸â›ªï¸ Let’s explore this fascinating Swiss city together!

Where is Zurich? ğŸ“ #

Zurich sits in the heart of Switzerland, in the northern part of this Alpine country. ğŸ—ºï¸ The city is perfectly positioned at the northwestern tip of Lake Zurich, surrounded by rolling hills and with the magnificent Alps visible in the distance. ğŸŒ„ At 408 meters (1,339 feet) above sea level, Zurich enjoys a spectacular setting between two forested hill chains. ğŸŒ²ğŸŒ³ The city stretches along the beautiful Limmat River, which flows from Lake Zurich through the heart of the city. ğŸŒŠ

item.title: 050. Oslo
item.description:
Oslo, Norway #

  • City: å¥§æ–¯é™¸ (ou3 si1 luk6)
  • Country: ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡´ æŒªå¨ (no4 wai1)

Where is Oslo Located? ğŸ“ #

Oslo is the capital city of Norway ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡´, a beautiful country in Northern Europe. Think of it like this: if you look at a map ğŸ—ºï¸ of Europe and find the top part that looks like it reaches toward the North Pole, that’s Scandinavia, and Norway is on the western side of it! Oslo sits in the southeastern part of Norway, right at the end of a special water feature called the Oslofjord. It’s like the city is sitting at the very tip of a long finger of ocean water ğŸŒŠ that stretches into the land.
